title: Cold Casing: The Mystery Of The Long-Lost Winchester Rifle
teaser: For archaeologist Eva Jensen, a happenstance find in Nevada has turned into an in-depth quest. Since stumbling across a Winchester rifle manufactured in 1882, she and other researchers have been seeking to unravel the mysteries behind it.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
